Title: Azuregos's Support
Description:
Many blue dragons have returned, and many others have informed me of their plans to make their ways to the Isles.

There are a few key members of the flight, however, that I have not heard from. One of them may be able to help: Azuregos, stationed within the Nexus in Northrend. 

You, myself, and Sindragosa will travel to meet Azuregos. He has ignored all of my attempts to contact him from afar.

Thanks to the oathstone being empowered, Sindragosa can now travel further than ever before.
ObjectivesText: Travel to the Nexus in Northrend to meet Azuregos.

Objectives.Text: Azuregos found within the Nexus in Northrend
